Federal government websites often end in .gov or .mil. Before sharing sensitive information, make sure you're on a federal government site.

The site is secure.
The https:// ensures that you are connecting to the official website and that any information you provide is encrypted and transmitted securely.

repository.pki.gov

  • FAQ

A repository for the U.S. Federal Public Trust
Transport Layer Security Public Key Infrastructure

This website will host the policy, practices, audit letters, and other information related to a planned service the U.S. Government is building to issue digital certificates to federal DotGov and DotMil web services.

Learn more

Welcome

Welcome to repository.pki.gov. We will update this website as the U.S. Federal Public Trust Transport Layer Security Public Key Infrastructure is built.

  • Visit the Documentation section to read our Certificate Policy, Certification Practices Statements, Terms of Service, or incident reporting procedures.
  • Check out our Frequently Asked Questions page to learn more about the planned service.

Contact us

  • Email us at tls-help@gsa.gov.

Privacy policy

  • View our site's privacy policy.

Have feedback?

  • Create an issue on the code repository.
